intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to create a Fair Document for documenting information about the People, Exhibits, and Livestock at an Animal Exposition.

item.title: Show Tracker Perspective
item.description: Open the Tracker perspective in the Workbench.

item.title: Create or Open a Project
item.description: Create a new Project or Open an old Project in the Workbench.

item.title: Create New Fair Document
item.description:
File > New > Fair Document.
Then Select the parent project folder of the Fair Document.

item.title: Choose Fair Root Entry
item.description:
You will be prompted for the root Fair Model Object to create.
Choose Fair element in the drop down list.

item.title: Load a Premises Document Resource
item.description:
The Fair Editor is a composite document editor. It manages the edits for both a Fair Document resource and an associated Premises Document resource.
In the instance of the Fair Editor where the new Fair Document is displayed, right mouse click on the entry showing the document name to show the popup menu.
Select the Load Resource menu item and browse for a Premises Document to associate with this Fair Document.
You should now see a Premises Document showing in the editor below the Fair Document.
You can view, edit and manipulate this Premises Document like a normal Premises Document.

item.title: Show Properties View
item.description: To edit the entries in a Fair Document open the Properties view.

item.title: Document Fair Details
item.description:
Tracker Editors show documents as trees of parent and child entries.
Selecting entries in the Editor trees will display their details in the Properties view.
In the instance of the Fair Editor where the new Fair Document is displayed, unfold the entry showing the document name and select the root Fair entry.
In the Properties view you can now enter or change the properties of the Fair entry.
Note the Fair Premises attribute. The drop down will show the loaded Premises Document. Select it.

item.title: Show People View
item.description: Open the People view to add People to the Fair Document.

item.title: Add People
item.description:
The People view is a composite master-detail view of the Young People and Adultsassocitated with the Fair.
Like the Properties view you can use this view to see and edit details about People. You can also use this view to sort, filter, and navigate through all People in the Fair Document.
Select the green + in the toolbar of the People view to add People to the Fair.

item.title: Show Exhibits View
item.description: Once you have added one or more People you can associate them with Exhibits. Open the Exhibits view to add Exhibits to a hierarchy of Lot-Class-Department-Division entries in the Fair Document.

item.title: Add Exhibits
item.description:
Like the People view the Exhibits view is a master-detail view of all the Exhibits in the Fair.
Use this view to add details, filter, and navigate through all Exhibits in the Premises Document. Select the green + in the toolbar of the Exhibits view to add Exhibits to the Fair.

item.title: Save Document
item.description:
Once your done editing the save the file.
File > Save
To save the Fair Document to Disk.
